title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: I hope Doom Bots eventually returns...
^^^^ doom bots riot!!
what's doom bots?
A Lux ult turned into 20 of them all forming around her in a circle formation, then her Q became a perma-stun if it hit just one person
It's basically a bots game but their attacks are extremely strong. For example, a Cho Gath spike thing would have 3 of them in a line instead of 1. Source: YOUTUBE
hexakills sucks

why is this game mode only available during a specific time ?
some people will miss out on this game mode entirely
Like me for example this needs to be addressed
It's due to lack of players. If they release it earlier/end later it will have a large effect on other queue times
Yeah seriously. I doubt there's a technical reason for this. These times seem totally arbitrary and needlessly exclude people from the mode
Same reason they disable ranked at certain times of the night. There's no one on and it'd affect queue times of other modes.
"Hexakill online now!" *disclaimer: not actually online now.
Because it wasn't 11:00am at the time you said that.
Firstly, it was 12.49pm local time, I have no idea what AEST is. Secondly, the client was proudly boasting it was live now at the time.

AEST means Australian Eastern Standard Time and the client was saying it was live because it was out on Friday night (the day before) which was then turned off at 3:00am on Saturday before coming back on again at 11:00am.
I see where the problem is
RIP Doombots...
{{champion:37}} 6v6 fun times ahead thanks riot now do a 10v10
why not have 5v5v5v5 with 4 nexus 4 inhib and stuff
That'd involve making a new map.
lol ofcourse, I hope they do-_-
" such as potentially turning it on longer " URF FOREVER!!!{{summoner:12}}
They use the worst map for Hexakill. Why not use Summoners Rift?
Can OCE get dominion just for a weekend?
cant wait 4 urf

Ascension...almost three times in a row
But no urf mode for months!
I'm actually really excited for these, as a super-casual heathen.
You could try two gamemodes available at once, and just extend the period it's available. People won't have to wait as long for their favourite mode. :D Could get a bit messy, though...
You must be in the wrong time zone because it's 11:45am where I am right now.
well even if i am wrong, U still say its 11 oclock and thats when hexakill is on.
I sent my message two hours after you I'm presuming you must be ahead of AEST making you able to play it at 1:00pm. Other than that I don't know why.
No mine is correct

Hexakill wasnt that fun tbh
maybe combine it with urf on the TT map... otherwise have hexa on SR
riot pls make each game mode last longer man
{{summoner:11}} increase the dmg of the site plz make it the max 1500 plz :)

wait riot dosent care about us because were in oce
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
it would be pretty fun to have a 1v1v1v1v1 in crystal scar or something like a free for all game mode

wait riot dosent care about us because were in oce
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
{{champion:245}} give me ekko :)
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I want black market brawlers back riot :)
It was bad, but the items were cool, Rito plz we want Brawlers
and what about new gamemodes
Please DoomBots Or I'll Feed
reported -_-
Black Market brawlers would be great too
where is blackmarket brawlers
